channel.title: Snackbar-Games Podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your games. Your site. Your community.
channel.itunes:summary: Join the crew of Snackbar Games for a fun and raucous foray in the the gaming industry. Commentary on the latest news and headlines as well as tons of special guests round out this fantastic show.
channel.itunes:author: Snackbar Games Crew
